title: How to Make an Egg and Avocado Salad

steps.headline: Prepare the avocado.
steps.description:
Cut the avocado vertically in half to two equal pieces. Remove the pit (seed) and discard. steps.headline: Prepare the eggs.
steps.description:

steps.headline: Cut or mash the eggs, depending on how you wish to serve the salad.
steps.description: Use a knife to dice the eggs or a pastry cutter for a finer dice. Use a fork to mash the eggs.

steps.headline: Add the mayonnaise and seasonings to the eggs.
steps.description: For three eggs, start with 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of mayonnaise, mix, and adjust everything to taste.

steps.headline: Spoon the egg mixture into the avocado halves.
steps.description: Garnish by sprinkling parsley or paprika on top of the mixture. Finished.

steps.headline: Prepare the avocado and egg salad as outlined above, but make the following adjustments...
